snippet: As the Republican mainstream has been threatened by the Tea Party, Senator Pat Roberts is desperate to re-establish ties to Kansas and adjust his politics to fit the rise of the right there.
abstract: Sen Pat Roberts is now desperate to re-establish ties to Kansas and to adjust his politics to fit rise of the right there; his efforts underscore the awkward reality of Republicans who, after coming of age in an era of comity and esteem for long-term service, are trying to remake themselves to be warriors for a Tea Party age.
lead_paragraph: As the Republican mainstream has been threatened by the Tea Party, Senator Pat Roberts is desperate to re-establish ties to Kansas and adjust his politics to fit the rise of the right there.

headline.main: Lacking a House, a Senator Is Renewing His Ties in Kansas
headline.print_headline: Lacking a House, a Senator Is Renewing His Ties in Kansas
